page.title: 14HOUSING FOR SALE PRICES
page.content: Northop Hall-price Â£44,950 A delightful detached four bedroomed cottage, fully modernised and improved, enjoying a beautiful rural outlook.Double glazed windows and full central heating.Lounge, dining room or snug, kitchen, bathroom, four bedrooms, detached garage, conservatory, large garden. Sychdyn-price Â£28000 New Brighton Road. An early inspection is essential to appreciate this superbly appointed four bedroomed semi-detached cottage,full central heating and sealed unit double glazing with leaded lights, hard wood frames. With porch, entrance hall, lounge, dining room, kitchen, fully fitted bathroom, car parking space, gardens to rear. INFORMATION FROM CHESTER CHRONICLE
